Candy Girl is a match 3 puzzle game where you can switch, swap, and collect candies with everyone's favorite candy girls on their yummy planet ! You will love this candy collecting adventure and watch them weave their magic!

▶ Match 3 or more bubbles, gems, charm or candy

▶Tons of puzzle levels for you to master. Line up pieces for wonderful power-ups to help you get through even the hardest levels! 

▶Blast and clear many fun obstacles like gummy treats , fluffy cake , and sugar balls ! 

▶ Match your way to the candy fort through like ice blocks , diamond rocks and jewel orbs

▶Are you the best on the planet? Check the tournament leader board to see how far you can get compared to all the other bold players out there!

▶Mix and match power-ups to create even more powerful double helix combos. Watch the Candy Girls dance and jump along as the most amazing and exciting combos fall and bounce ! Dunk all the sweet treats !

▶Complete levels to collect keys to dozens of different magical chests in the tower .  Unlock for free items like moves, magic paint balls and even more power-ups! 

▶Miraculous backgrounds and cool songs will have you dancing around this game forever !

This is one of the longest and most entertaining puzzles around! Great for time management and keep your brain sharp!  With over 5000 levels to play and many more being added, you can stay with this toon style candy game a very long time ! Buy more combos to help you save time but not necessary to win.

Send your New Year Stickers  in a new and fun way. Send them alone or stick them on top of word bubbles. Simply touch and hold the sticker you want to use, then drag it into place. You can even resize the sticker with two fingers.


To start using Happy New Year Stickers Pack in iMessage:
- Open a message with a friend and tap ">" button to the left to the text box
- Tap the app button that appears (it looks like an "A") and then tap the button the button in the lower left (looks like four circles). This opens up the iMessage app drawer.
-Tap New Year Stickers icon to start sending stickers

Tips & tricks in sending stickers:
-Tap to send sticker 
- Touch and hold to 'peel off' the sticker. Then, move it around to stick them on top of speech bubbles, other stickers or photos.

Cirko's mission is to inspire and empower everyone to make new friends. 

Cirko allows you to scan QRcode to add a new friend and automatically saves their name, phone number, email address and profile pic to your phone. You can also see their Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter accounts all in the app. And of course, you can chat with them in the app. Secret power moves are available to surprise your friends with lots of love and caring. 

Features available: 
 - browse through people nearby
 - scan ANY standard QR code
 - save contact to contacts app on iPhone
 - chat with other users in the app
 - send photos and videos to other users
 - request to access a friend's social media usernames
 - send powerful emojis to other users

Note: Cirko does not save your chat messages history. All messages that have been read by both parties are instantly destroyed on the server. Cirko values your privacy and would never share your contact information with anyone without your permission.

The dance man was created by our team to make you laugh and shake your stress away . The dance moves are especially choreographed to lighten your mood . So have a little fun . 

When you move your body your stress goes away and what better way to do it than with your friends .

Candy Halloween Games is a match 3 puzzle game where you can match and collect candies with spooky vampire or scary zombie ! Go on a candy collecting adventure with the cutest wicked witch and monsters ! You will love playing with all these ghoulish characters !

This is one of the longest and most entertaining puzzles around! With over 1000 levels to play and many more being added, you can hop along with this bunny game for a furry long time! Boo!

-- A new kind of word game for puzzle lovers! --

Swipe your finger across the letters to spell out the hidden words! Do you like word searches? Swipe across, up, down, and diagonally to connect each letter and build specific hidden words. The game gets harder as you progress with bigger and bigger puzzles!

- Free word game to download and play!
- Solve the words in the right order to progress!
- Featuring hundreds of mind bending levels!
- Sharpen your vocabulary, spelling and word building skills!
- The perfect blend of brain teaser, puzzle and word game!
- Loads of ways to play - fun and addictive
- Fun to play on your own or with other members of the family

Download it and enjoy now!


We often get users complaining that there is a bug in the game. It’s not! If you can’t connect the letters it’s because you have solved the words in the wrong order! Restart the level by tapping the reset button and try to solve the words in a new order!

column1: 艺术世纪-最有逼.格的艺术品发布平台，写真与艺术并举，当代与古典齐飞，画展，展览的最佳浏览地
column2:
艺术世纪APP是针对诸众美育提升的人类文明优秀成果共享平台。平台由“世界艺展”、“全球艺馆”、“中华世纪坛”三个模块组成。

“世界艺馆”整合了世界顶级博物馆、艺术馆及收藏和展示人类优秀文明成果的机构的高清数字珍藏，通过便捷、人性化的交互体验方式供诸众研究、学习、交流和飨用。

“世界艺展”是即时检索和深度浏览当下世界重要文艺机构正在上演的优秀的展览、演出、放映等文化展事，是您掌控世界艺术格局，履行艺术之旅的工具书。

“中华世纪坛”将为诸众推出能够代表世界艺术、当代艺术、艺术科技、艺术影像、艺术剧目五个艺术面向的优秀的示范项目。引领您进入中华世纪坛的实体空间，享受不可或缺的超级现场体验。
